title: Why can people be impatient? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m really impatient, it’s mainly because I have some life goals which I want to achieve untill I’ll be 25 (4 yrs from now). It’s because I’m kinda afraid of getting old and be pi***d off, because I worked all the time, when I was young and had to enjoy my life. There are two reasons why I work so hard. Because of making money as fast as possible and reduce amount of time which I need to spend in work. I’m so lazy, so I don’t want to work 8 hrs. every day, but I want to have enough money for me and my parents to enjoy. And this leads me to be impatient, because I want to have everything asap. I want my project to be done asap, I want sell my project asap, I want to have everything asap, so I can enjoy after it. And this made me so impatient about everything, not just about work, but about almost everything I do… This is just my reason to be impatient, of course everyone has their own behavior and someone is just swallowed by society, so I can’t answer you objectively. Anyway I hope this helps you. :)
